svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Ordered milestones of women's political representation
Percentage of sovereign countries in each year which completed five milestones of women's political representation
in the following order: right to vote to all women (universal suffrage), first female elected to parliament, 10%, 20% and
Source: OWID Women’s Political Representation using Paxton et al (2006), IPU & WDI (2017)
